author: Libby Cathey
title: Government response updates: Trump pushes reopening US, Fauci backs 'rolling reentry'
description: President Trump is clashing with the nation's top expert on infectious diseases Dr. Anthony Fauci after the doctor said earlier social distancing would have saved lives.
content:
President Donald Trump heads into a new week stressing his effort to reopen the country after appearing to publicly rebuke his top expert on infectious disease, Dr. Anthony Fauci.
Fauci said Sunday that the Trump administration "could have saved lives" had f… [+6578 chars]
